div.p: Ensemble mean zonal mean ozone response to: ( a) Climatological annual cycle of the column ozone from the control run. ( b) Column ozone and ( c) column ozone anomalies over the first 12 years after the eruption in the Halog + SAD forcing experiment. The black contour in ( b, c) marks the region where column ozone drops below 220 DU which is the definition of the Antarctic ozone hole.
